instructions: Image titled Tell Who Has Viewed Your Instagram Story on Android Step 1 1 Open Instagram on your Android. It s the multicolored camera icon typically found on the home screen or in the app drawer. Image titled Tell Who Has Viewed Your Instagram Story on Android Step 2 2 Tap your story. It s the circle that says You beneath it at the top-left corner of the screen. This opens your story. Image titled Tell Who Has Viewed Your Instagram Story on Android Step 3 3 Swipe up on your story. This expands a panel at the bottom of the screen containing the names of people who ve viewed your story, as well as the total number of views. Advertisement
